thread.title: Ground News - Man braves Chicago winter storm to make 405th blood donation
thread.title_full: Ground News - Man braves Chicago winter storm to make 405th blood donation

author: News
title: Ground News - Man braves Chicago winter storm to make 405th blood donation
text: Winter weather can bring some critical operations to a hault and that includes less people donating blood, but not this guy! William Ward, 76, braved the storm to make his 405th blood donation at Vitalant's Oak Lawn location.
